parameters.query: SELECT id, entity_id, strike_count, is_blocked, blocked_until, last_strike_at FROM security_firewall WHERE entity_id = $1;

INSERT INTO security_firewall (id, entity_id, strike_count, last_strike_at, created_at) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), $1, 1, NOW(), NOW()) ON CONFLICT (entity_id) DO UPDATE SET strike_count = security_firewall.strike_count + 1, last_strike_at = NOW() WHERE security_firewall.entity_id = $1 RETURNING strike_count;
